Current chronic history liver disease include fatty liver , know hepatic biliary abnormality ( exception Gilbert 's syndrome asymptomatic gallstone ) . Corrected QT interval ( QTc ) > 450 msec . Subjects history time past coronary artery disease , congestive heart failure , angina , myocardial infarction , cardiac surgery , valvular heart disease , clinically significant arrhythmia , dyspnea , pulmonary edema , stroke , transient ischemic attack .
